name: Iarla Ó Lionáird
description: '''Iarla Ó Lionáird''' (born {{birth based on age as of date |58|2022|08|22|noage=1}}) is an Irish singer and [[record producer]]. He sings in the traditional [[Sean-nós singing|sean-nós]] style. He was a member of the [[Afro Celt Sound System]] and is a member of the Irish-American [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] [[The Gloaming]]. He has recorded several solo albums for [[Real World Records]]. He appeared in the 2015 film ''[[Brooklyn (film)|Brooklyn]]'' singing an [[a cappella]] version of the Irish song "Casadh an tSúgáin".
